cv: "RESUME Levi Rickie Wilderman, PhD student (Computer Science), Room No. CS 106 Department of Computer Science, IIT, KANPUR, UP, INDIA. Work Experience: \xef\x81\xac Pursuing research in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT, Kanpur. Worked as a Lecturer in the Department of Information & Communication Technology at Manipal Institute of Technology, MANIPAL from 04-09-2003 to 19-12-2007 ( 4 years 3 months). 1.5 years of work experience as a Lecturer in the Department of Mathematics at Government College, Kasaragod 671 121. Built a Linux kernel module for easy integration of the solution to the enterprise environment. 2.
